result.execSummary:
The defendant Dustin Allen Grice was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Carry Concealed Weapon, a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 941.23(2).
  • Disorderly Conduct, a class B misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 947.01(1).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

miscConds.notes: $443 costs--DOC collect.  If probation is revoked or discharged with outstanding financial obligations, a civil judgment shall be entered against the defendant.  All available enforcement actions will be used to collect the debt.
Seized stun gun ordered forfeited to Beloit PD.

judgments.action: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

charges.dispoDesc: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Dustin Allen Grice

records.descr: Notice of court ordered financial obligations
Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt: As condition of probation, defendant to serve 60 days jail without Huber.

Defendant Dustin Allen Grice in court with attorney Walter H Isaacson.  Mark Matthew Jahnke appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Amended Information filed, copy to Defendant, reading waived.  No contest plea to both counts, Court finds defendant guilty.  Sentence withheld, Court orders 2 years probation each count, concurrent, with conditions:  DOC collect costs; no sentence credit if revoked.  Court orders stun gun forfeited.

Defendant Dustin Allen Grice in court with attorney Walter H Isaacson.  Anne Theresa Nack appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Jury instructions to be filed by noon on 8-12-2016.  Final pre-trial scheduled for August 12, 2016 at 09:00 am.

Defendant Dustin Allen Grice in court with attorney Walter H Isaacson.  Jodi Dabson Bollendorf and intern Anthony Moore appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Motions to be filed by 7-22-2016.  Final pre-trial scheduled for August 10, 2016 at 09:00 am.  Jury selection scheduled for August 15, 2016 at 09:00 am.  Jury trial scheduled for August 15, 2016 at 09:00 am.

Defendant Dustin Allen Grice in court with attorney Walter H Isaacson by Faun Moses.  Katharine Buker appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for June 1, 2016 at 02:00 pm.
Defendant Dustin Allen Grice in court with attorney Walter H Isaacson.  Mary Elizabeth Bricco appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for April 29, 2016 at 09:00 am.
Defendant Dustin Allen Grice in court with attorney Walter H Isaacson.  Gerald Anthony Urbik appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Calendar call scheduled for April 6, 2016 at 09:00 am.

Defendant Dustin Allen Grice in court with attorney Walter H Isaacson.  Mason C. Braunschweig appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Information filed, copy to Defendant, reading waived.  Defendant pleads not guilty and jury trial to be set.

Defendant Dustin Allen Grice in court with attorney Walter H Isaacson.  Scott Henry Dirks appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant waives preliminary hearing freely and voluntarily.  Court accepts waiver and binds the Defendant over for the filing of an Information.  Arraignment scheduled for January 13, 2016 at 01:00 pm.
Defendant Dustin Allen Grice in court with attorney Walter H Isaacson.  Gwanny J Tjoa appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Preliminary hearing scheduled for December 28, 2015 at 08:30 am.

Defendant Dustin Allen Grice in court.  Anne Theresa Nack appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Complaint filed, copy to Defendant, penalties advised, rights given, reading waived.  Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for December 16, 2015, at 1:00 pm.
May not possess any weapons or firearms.
